channel.title: Problem adding customs

item.title: Problem adding customs
item.dc:creator: @critics critics
item.description:
@critics wrote:

hey guys i have a client that i dont want to change really as there is custom npcs and items that i cant seem to get rip off of it.

the problem i have is the class8, isnt called class 8 and for example here is one of the customs:

    }
    if (i == 14086) {
        itemData.interactionArray = new String[5];
        itemData.interactionArray[1] = "Wield";
        itemData.invoModel = 14086;
        itemData.zoom = 1500; // zoom; increase will make it smaller
        itemData.rotateDown = 0; // model rotate; up+down increase to move down away from you
        itemData.rotateRight = 180; // model rotate; side ways increase to move right in circle
        itemData.xAxis = 35; // model offset; increase to move to the right
        itemData.yAxis = 30; // model offset; increase to move up
        itemData.maleWieldModel = 14086;
        itemData.femaleWieldModel = 14086;
        itemData.maleSleeveModel = -1;
        itemData.femaleSleeveModel = -1;
        itemData.itemName = "Pheonix Godsword";
        itemData.examineByteArray = "A godsword containing the finest pheonix hair.".getBytes();
    }

ofcourse you add a normal int it gives loads of errors upon compiler just wanted to know if anyone knows a way around this.

thanks

Read full topic
